status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
Dissolve the sea salt and tryptone in distilled water. 

For 500ml

  • 20g of sea salts
  • 5g of tryptone
  • 495ml of distilled water
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Dissolve the sea salt and tryptone in distilled water. 

For 500ml

  • 20g of sea salts
  • 5g of tryptone
  • 495ml of distilled water

components.data: Filter it through Whatman filter paper to remove undissolved salt
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter it through Whatman filter paper to remove undissolved salt

components.data: Mix it with magnetic stirrer and filter the media again with (0.22µm) filter
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix it with magnetic stirrer and filter the media again with (0.22µm) filter

components.data: Place the media at 27°C for dense culture or 15°C for optimal growth. It is also recommended that the media should be tested for the presence of any contaminants, prior to the addition of cells, by keeping overnight incubation of media in the particular incubator
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the media at 27°C for dense culture or 15°C for optimal growth. It is also recommended that the media should be tested for the presence of any contaminants, prior to the addition of cells, by keeping overnight incubation of media in the particular incubator

components.data: After half an hour incubation of media in the incubator, add healthy cell culture to the flask 1:10 times diluted
components.name: Description

source_data.description: After half an hour incubation of media in the incubator, add healthy cell culture to the flask 1:10 times diluted

components.data: Check the general appearance of the cells immediately after adding the cells in the media and also after 6-8 h of incubation in the particular media using inverted phase contrast microscope.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check the general appearance of the cells immediately after adding the cells in the media and also after 6-8 h of incubation in the particular media using inverted phase contrast microscope.
